ABOUT ME
As an ambitious junior, I would consider myself as a mature, positive and hardworking 
individual, who always have a motivated attitude at any given task. Besides, I also keep 
up with a clear & logical mindset in many practical approaches to problem-solving, and 
willing to drive things to grow.
Admittedly, I believe the priceless key to success is to confidently answer the question 
"How far you want to go?" but not "How long have you been doing...?" Thus, I am 
sincerely eager to learn more and enjoy overcoming challenges in where I can enhance 
and utilize the personal mission to become an expert in developing business 
opportunities.
